drinks.name: margarita
drinks.description: Prepare a Margarita by rimming a glass with salt, shaking tequila, fresh lime juice, triple sec, and simple syrup with ice, straining it into the glass, and garnishing with a lime wedge before enjoying responsibly.

drinks.name: Sex on the beach
drinks.description: Mix vodka, peach schnapps, cranberry juice, and orange juice in a shaker, strain into a glass over ice, garnish with an orange slice, and enjoy responsibly.

drinks.name: Scooby Snack Shot
drinks.description: Combine Coconut Rum, Melon Liqueur, and Pineapple juice in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a shot glass. Top with a dollop of Whipped Cream and sprinkle Coconut Flakes on top. Enjoy responsibly.

drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.description: Muddle fresh mint leaves and simple syrup in a glass. Add lime juice and white rum. Fill the glass with ice and top with club soda. Garnish with a lime wedge and a sprig of mint. Stir and enjoy.
